description: Extracts and structures client requirements including technical constraints, business objectives, compliance needs, scalability targets, and integration requirements

client_objectives: Support both mobile and web clients
business_goals: Enable online sales with secure payment processing
Handle high user concurrency to support business growth
Maintain up-to-date inventory information for users

scalability_targets.throughput: Not specified; clarification needed on expected transactions per second
scalability_targets.data_volume: Not specified; clarification needed on expected product, order, and user data sizes
geographic_regions: Not specified; clarification needed if the platform is global or regional

non_functional_requirements.availability: Not specified; clarification needed on target uptime (e.g., 99.9%)
non_functional_requirements.latency: Not specified; clarification needed on acceptable response times
non_functional_requirements.data_retention: Not specified; clarification needed on order, user, and transaction data retention policies
